column4: Have lost grub boot-up menu. System boots straight into low res (720x400) screen. Surely there must be an easy way to change the resolution to at least workable???
is it a case of reinstall?
click on the panel and use arrow keys to navigate to monitors?
- the only usuable thing and with difficulty is the terminal
i can still access the panel in 720x450
are you on nvidia, ati, or intel graphics?
just run nvidia-settings from terminal and change display settings
you said you could access a terminal, so just type nvidia-settings in there
